messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Was: IT'S SNOWING HERE!! also coins
messages.msgSnippet: Kelli, Thanks so much for the reminder. I meant to Post to Brena (I ll post and sent really soon) for christmas but now it won t get lost in the shuffle.
messages.messageBody:
Kelli,
Thanks so much for the reminder. I meant to Post to Brena (I'll post and
sent really soon) for christmas but now it won't get lost in the shuffle.
Valentines Day is coming. If I can wait to give it to them. <BWWG>


Barb E
"The smartest thing that a person can do is to persistently think
the thoughts that are consistent with the kind of person he or she
would like to be."

- Brian Tracy, Author and Personal Development Expert

messages.msgSnippet: Brenda - Do you have any interest in a package swap?  Anything you re missing from Massachusetts for coins/brochures/whatever from there?  You can email me
messages.messageBody:
Brenda - Do you have any interest in a package swap? Anything you're
missing from Massachusetts for coins/brochures/whatever from there? You
can email me privately if you're interested. Thanks ~Rue

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Was: IT'S SNOWING HERE!! also coins
messages.msgSnippet: Cool,  Brenda!      You would think those homeschoolers would be doing some weather study, huh? I also wanted to mention,   my kids are having a ball with
messages.messageBody:
Cool, Brenda! You would think those homeschoolers would be doing some weather study, huh?<g>

I also wanted to mention, my kids are having a ball with the coins you sent. I don't know if people remember, but Brenda had offered to send Euros and other currency if anyone wanted. We got some.

We ended up looking up conversions and all sorts of things, the kids really got a kick our of yen and that conversion. So much history in currency. We would have done it longer, but then we had to go cross country skiing, no ignoring snow here! <g>

Thanks again Brenda,

Kelli


Alan & Brenda Leonard <abtleo@...> wrote:It's snowing! It's snowing! I can't believe it. Germany used to get a lot
of snow, people tell me, but all we've had has been rain, rain, rain.

Tim is outside and LOVING it. There's not another kid in sight. I called
the other homeschoolers I know here, but they're busy doing school right now
and can't come out. <sigh>

I wonder what they're learning that so much more important than snow?!?

brenda

messages.subject: IT'S SNOWING HERE!!
messages.msgSnippet: It s snowing!  It s snowing!  I can t believe it.  Germany used to get a lot of snow, people tell me, but all we ve had has been rain, rain, rain. Tim is
messages.messageBody:
It's snowing! It's snowing! I can't believe it. Germany used to get a lot
of snow, people tell me, but all we've had has been rain, rain, rain.

Tim is outside and LOVING it. There's not another kid in sight. I called
the other homeschoolers I know here, but they're busy doing school right now
and can't come out. <sigh>

I wonder what they're learning that so much more important than snow?!?

brenda
